name: Pig Pen Pushout
description:
Local Multiplayer, where you fight to push the other out of the circle.  Highest score at the end of the timer wins.   NOTE! Two Xbox controllers is needed to play.   

Controls: 

A = Huddle up/Break 

B = Move/Accelerate 

RB = Charge  

L Analog Stick = Turn 

Options + A = Restart Game 

Options + B = Exit Game
